11 struct letter_only : std::ctype<char> {
12  letter_only() : std::ctype<char>(get_table()) {}
13 
14  static std::ctype_base::mask const* get_table() {
15  static std::vector<std::ctype_base::mask>
16  rc(std::ctype<char>::table_size,std::ctype_base::space);
17 
18  std::fill(&rc['A'], &rc['z'+1], std::ctype_base::alpha);
19  return &rc[0];
20  }
21 };

44  word_list.clear();

46  input.open(filename);

61 int Dictionary::compare(const std::string& filename) {
62  std::map<std::string, int> wordCnt;
63  std::ifstream input;
64  input.open(filename);
65  std::string word;
66 
67  while(input >> word) {
68  ++wordCnt[word];
69  }
70 
71  int matchedCnt = 0;
72  for(auto w : word_list) {
73  if(wordCnt.count(w))
74  ++matchedCnt;
75  }
76 
77  return matchedCnt;
78 }
